SEARCH
Package VotingSystem

Class PO

java.lang.Object
VotingSystem.Election
VotingSystem.PO
public class PO extends Election
PO Election that can read in data from ballot file(s), execute the PO election algorithm, and output the results, all while writing to an audit file

  • Constructor Details

    • PO

      public PO(ArrayList<FileReader> input, FileWriter audit, BufferedReader br)
      This is the constructor for PO.
      Parameters:
      input - An ArrayList of FileReader objects that represent the election input files to process
      audit - A FileWriter that represents the audit file to write to
      br - Is the BufferReader that this class will use to parse the input file

  • Method Details

    • getVoteTotal

      public int getVoteTotal()
      Getter method for the total votes of the PO election, primarily used for testing
      Returns:
      The int representing the total amount of votes

    • getVotes

      public int[] getVotes()
      Getter method for the total votes for each candidate of the PO election, primarily used for testing
      Returns:
      The int array representing the total amount of votes for each party

    • getCandidates

      public String[] getCandidates()
      Getter method for the candidates of the PO election, primarily used for testing
      Returns:
      The string array representing the the candiates and their parties

    • getWinners

      public String[] getWinners()
      Getter method for the winners of the PO election, primarily used for testing (tie case)
      Returns:
      The string array representing the the candiates and their parties who won

    • getWinner

      public String getWinner()
      Getter method for the winner of the PO election, primarily used for testing (non-tie case)
      Returns:
      The string array representing the the candiate and his/her party

    • processFile

      public void processFile()
      Processes the input file to count votes for each party and writes the record to the audit file
      Specified by:
      processFile in class Election

    • conductAlgorithm

      public void conductAlgorithm()
      Conducts main algorithm for PO election, determines the winner and writes the record to the audit file
      Specified by:
      conductAlgorithm in class Election

    • parseHeader

      public void parseHeader()
      Parses the header of the input file and creates the parties and candidates internally, as well as stores other auxiliary information like the number of votes and number of seats in the election
      Specified by:
      parseHeader in class Election

    • printResults

      public void printResults()
      Function that prints results of the PO election to the terminal. Will first show all the parties and how many seats they've won, then will show who exactly (candidate names) have won a seat and their associated party.
      Specified by:
      printResults in class Election
